title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 578.4 - Traffic controls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 578.4 - Traffic controls

State Regulations

The following traffic controls are applicable to the
grounds of the State University of New York College at Geneseo, Village of

Geneseo, Livingston County, unless otherwise indicated. (a) 15 MPH is established as the maximum
speed limit at which vehicles may proceed on or along all roadways. (b) The following intersections are
designated as stop intersections: Intersection of

With stop sign
on

from

west roadway to Parking Lot H

east roadway to Parking Lot H

(d) The following roadways are designated for
one-way traffic: (1)

Circle west of college
union for traffic proceeding in a counterclockwise direction only. (2)

Circle south of main gym for traffic
proceeding in a counterclockwise direction only, except roadway east of
circle. (3)

Circle west of the fine
arts building for traffic proceeding in a counterclockwise direction
only. (e) Lanes are
designated for one-way traffic in all parking lots as indicated by traffic
signs and pavement markings. (f) Parking or standing is prohibited on or along both sides of all highways except
in locations as follows: (1)

Stopping is
prohibited, except buses, on the southerly side of College Drive and roadway to

Holcomb school between roadway to Parking Lot N and the most easterly building
line of school complex. (g) Parking is prohibited for a period of
time longer than posted. (1)

On the south
side of the Holcomb school roadway from the most easterly building line of the
school complex easterly 200 + feet. (2)

On the outside circumference of the
traffic circle west of the college union. (3)

On the outside circumference of the
traffic circle west of the fine arts building. (4)

On the north side of Park Street - south
of Brodie fine arts building, at parking cove for a distance of 150 +
feet. (5)

On the outside
circumference of the traffic circle - west of the college union building, at
parking cove for a distance of 115 + feet; and east of the Schrader HPE
building, at parking cove for a distance of 130 + feet. (6)

On the south side of the town of

Geneseo's portion of Court Street. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
578.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
